channel.title: Connection lost / loading please wati
channel.description:
if i join a server it says or: connectino lost, please wait to .........., and then it continous, and if it works it says loading - please wait, and if i wait a long time (minmal 5 minutes), and it dont work
help i'm addicted
(also on silab it got connection error when it requests title screen)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 28, 2009, 07:06:13 am[/size][hr]b etter sayed it frezes with loading please wait
